ns0:si.ns0:t: sprint#
group#
group task description
task#
task description
remarks
status
deviations (from original plan)
Backend foundation: FastAPI skeleton, config, meta DB setup
Create FastAPI project skeleton with basic app factory and routing structure.
implemented
Implement configuration loader (env-based) for DB paths, Kite keys, and app settings.
Design and create sigmaqlab_meta.db schema migration for core tables (strategies, strategy_parameters, backtests).
Set up structured logging for backend (JSON or key-value format) with log levels and request logging.
Frontend foundation: React+TS+MUI scaffold and base layout
Create React + TypeScript + Vite (or CRA) app and integrate Material UI.
Implement global layout: AppBar with SigmaQLab branding, navigation skeleton, and basic dark theme.
Set up React Router with routes for Dashboard, Strategies, Backtests, Data, Settings.
Developer experience: tooling, linting, and pre-commit
Configure backend tooling: black, isort, mypy/ruff, and add pre-commit hooks.
Configure frontend tooling: ESLint, Prettier, TypeScript strict settings.
Add basic test harness for backend (pytest) with one sample test to validate CI wiring.
Data service: Kite/yfinance integration and price DB persistence
Implement Zerodha Kite client wrapper for historical OHLCV and holdings (read-only).
Implement optional yfinance/CSV loader as fallback data provider.
Design and create sigmaqlab_prices.db schema (price_bars table with indices).
Implement Data Service functions to fetch, normalize, and persist OHLCV data from providers into price DB.
Expose FastAPI endpoint to trigger data fetch for given symbol, timeframe, and date range.
Data management UI: fetch, list, and preview data
Create Data page with form to trigger data fetch via API (symbol, timeframe, date range).
pending
Implement table listing available symbol/timeframe combinations and coverage ranges.
Add simple price & volume preview chart for selected symbol/timeframe using chosen charting library.
Strategy service: metadata and parameter storage
Implement Strategy CRUD endpoints (create, list, get, update, delete) in FastAPI.
Implement Strategy Parameters CRUD endpoints and tie them to strategies.
Add fields for tags, categories, statuses, and integration metadata in schema and API models.
Strategy Library UI: list, details, and parameter sets
Implement Strategies list view with filters (status, category, search) and pagination.
Implement Strategy detail view showing description, tags, and recent backtests placeholder.
Add parameter set management UI (list, create, edit, delete) for each strategy.
Backtest engine: Backtrader integration and engine interface
Define Strategy Engine interface and BacktestResult data models in backend.
Integrate Backtrader as primary engine and implement adapter that conforms to engine interface.
Implement one reference strategy in Backtrader (e.g., simple SMA crossover) wired to a Strategy record.
Backtest execution: API endpoint and simple UI trigger
Implement API to run a single backtest given strategy_id, params_id, symbols, timeframe, and date range.
Add 'Run Backtest' modal/dialog in Strategy detail view to configure and submit a backtest.
Create basic Backtests list page showing submitted runs, status, and key summary fields.
Backtest results: persistence and metrics calculation
Persist equity curve and trades from Backtrader runs into backtest_equity_points and backtest_trades tables.
Compute key metrics (total return, max drawdown, win rate, average win/loss, trade count) and store in metrics_json.
Expose API endpoints to fetch backtest summary, equity series, and trades for a given backtest_id.
Backtest detail UI: equity chart, trades table, and parameters
Implement Backtest detail page with summary metrics and equity curve chart (interactive).
Add trades table with sorting/filtering, showing entry/exit, P&L, and basic stats.
Optionally overlay buy/sell markers on price chart for one-symbol backtests.
Batch backtesting: grid search and parallel execution
Extend backtest API to accept parameter grids or multiple parameter sets for batch execution.
Implement batch execution using ProcessPoolExecutor with isolation per run.
Store batch group identifier to link multiple backtests that belong to one optimization run.
Optimization UI: batch backtests and parameter-performance views
Create UI to configure and submit batch backtests (parameter ranges, symbol universe).
Implement batch results view showing parameter combinations and key metrics in tabular form.
Add simple visualization (e.g., heatmap or scatter plot) of parameters vs performance.
Portfolio snapshots: schema, API, and import from Kite
Create portfolio_snapshots schema and CRUD endpoints for storing holdings snapshots.
Implement Data Service function to import current holdings from Kite into a portfolio snapshot.
Add Portfolio page UI to list snapshots and show holdings with core/tactical tagging controls.
Portfolio-aware backtests: starting portfolio and constraints
Extend backtest engine config to accept a starting portfolio snapshot and core/tactical constraints.
Update metrics to report portfolio-level impact (realized + unrealized changes vs baseline).
Update Backtest configuration UI to allow selecting a portfolio snapshot when running a backtest.
Integration hooks: expose strategy summaries for SigmaTrader
Implement read-only API endpoint to return latest backtest summary for a given strategy_id for external consumers (SigmaTrader).
Ensure strategies can store and display linked SigmaTrader IDs and TradingView templates in the UI.
FastAPI app factory and /health endpoint created.
Env-based Settings config using pydantic-settings added.
sigmaqlab_meta.db schema for strategies/params/backtests wired via SQLAlchemy.
JSON logging with level/timestamp and Uvicorn integration configured.
React + TS + Vite + MUI frontend scaffolded.
Global dark theme and SigmaQLab layout (AppBar + nav) implemented.
React Router routes for Dashboard/Strategies/Backtests/Data/Settings added.
Backend tooling (black, ruff, pytest, pre-commit) configured.
Frontend tooling (ESLint, Prettier, strict TS) configured.
Basic pytest harness with /health test in place.
Kite client wrapper for historical OHLCV implemented.
yfinance and CSV data providers added as fallbacks.
sigmaqlab_prices.db and price_bars schema created.
DataService to fetch/normalise/persist OHLCV into prices DB implemented.
/api/data/fetch endpoint added and covered by tests.
Data page fetch form wired to backend data fetch API.
Coverage summary table listing symbol/exchange/timeframe and coverage added.
Price and volume preview charts (recharts) backed by preview API added.
Strategy CRUD API endpoints implemented.
Strategy parameter CRUD endpoints wired to strategies.
Tags/category/status/integration fields exposed in API models.
